name: Don't Spill The Tea
description:
Use platforms to guide the tea from the tea pot into the tea cup. Try not to spill too much tea!

Controls:

  • Move the platforms by clicking and dragging them with the mouse
  • Rotate the platforms by clicking the rotate buttons below the platforms.

This game was created for Trijam #156: The 3 hour game jam - itch.io
